main event: A report from Project Blue Book detailing a sighting of a single light over the Atlantic Ocean on July 7, 1959.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 3 minutes., The object exhibited slight upward and rapid downward movement., The object disappeared after following an irregular flight pattern., The distance of the object was estimated to be very high and distant., It was concluded that the object was probably an astronomical object or aircraft, with no evidence to suggest it was extraterrestrial.
sighted object: a single light in the sky
